category.name: Product Structure.Variant Administration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PS_VariantCondition_option_prefix
preference.preference_description: Sets the display format for option name in Variant Condition dialog. Valid Values: * true: Shows a string in the format "[ItemId]Option_name". * false: Shows a string in the format "[object_string]Option_name" where object string is the display name of the Item in user interface.
